# Secret Gift Portal üéÅ

Secure contact form for collecting shipping information with secret code + OTP verification.

## Quick Start

1. Get [Web3Forms](https://web3forms.com/) access key
2. Update `SECRET_CODE` in script.js
3. Add your access key in index.html and script.js
4. Deploy to Azure Static Web Apps

See [README.md](README.md) for detailed instructions.
